english_example_sentence: You were going to buy a new car, but the old model was cheaper.
russian_example_sentence: Ты собирался купить новую машину, но старая модель была дешевле.
turkish_example_sentence: Yeni bir araba satın alacaktın ama eski model daha ucuzdu.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: Yeni bir araba ______ ama eski model daha ucuzdu.
